Typedef Documentation

typedef enum mamaMiddleware_ mamaMiddleware

Enum to reference the available MAMA middlewares.

MAMA_MIDDLEWARE_MAX will be incremented when new middlewares become available

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum mamaMiddleware_

Enum to reference the available MAMA middlewares.

MAMA_MIDDLEWARE_MAX will be incremented when new middlewares become available
